<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

### Ids {#a70e73ed6ba82c4d0588650351fa70f95}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename BaseIter, unsigned NumOptSpecifiers = 0&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>OptSpecifier llvm::opt::arg&#95;iterator&lt; BaseIter, NumOptSpecifiers &gt;::Ids&#91;NumOptSpecifiers ? NumOptSpecifiers :1&#93;</>}>
Optional filters on the arguments which will be match.

To avoid a zero-sized array, we store one specifier even if we&#39;re asked for none.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/option/arglist-h/#l00046">46</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/option/arglist-h">ArgList.h</a>.
